title: 'Summoner School' in game chat room - find help, teachers, or people to play with!

embed.description: As a lot of you on NA and EUW probably know, the in game 'Summoner School' chat room can be a great place for people to get together, answer...

body:
Hey OCE,

If you haven't heard of the subreddit /r/SummonerSchool, its a pretty big community dedicated to helping people learn everything there is to know about LoL. Lots of great guides are posted their regularly, lots of people offering in game help and lots of people getting better at league.

With the introduction of the Team Rewards program (http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/team-and-earn-party-rewards) I thought it would be a good time to try and grow the in game Summoner School chat room. For NA and EUW, it has served as a great place for people to find others to team up with. Once enough people get in the chat room there is usually pretty constant discussion about all kinds of things. I think the community could really benefit from having an active, friendly chat room on OCE. We just need people in there to start growing it. 

If you don't know how to join the chat or haven't joined a chatroom in LoL before:

1) Click the double chat box icon (on the right of friends list icon)

2) Click "Create or Join a Chat Room"

3) Search "Summoner School"

4) Optional: Once you have the chat room open, there are 3 icons on the upper right of the chat box. Far left side is a gear icon with 2 checkboxes. "Autojoin on Startup" will open the chat automatically every time you log in.

See you in there!
rsjac
